      • compare

        public int compare(java.lang.Object a,
          java.lang.Object b)
        Description copied from class: HitProperty
        Compares two hits on this property. Note that we use Object as the type instead of Hit to save on run-time type checking. We know (slash hope :-) that this method is only ever called to compare Hits.
        Specified by:
        compare in interface java.util.Comparator<java.lang.Object>
        Specified by:
        compare in class HitProperty
        Parameters:
        a - first hit
        b - second hit
        Returns:
        0 if equal, negative if a < b, positive if a > b.
